HORROR_INTENSITY.0: Clean NeoPop futurism, pristine fashion portrait, no horror elements, perfect symmetry and confident calm.
HORROR_INTENSITY.1: Subtle glitch artifacts and mild uncanny identity: faint chromatic aberration, slightly synthetic skin texture, micro-distortions in reflections, a controlled but unsettling stillness.
